Detailed Description

Helper class.

The helper class is used to preform many common functions that do not necessarily belong in other classes.

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
Link:
http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework

2009 David Singer

David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
Version:
2.0.1

Member Function Documentation

static Boo_Helper::addHttp ( $  url  )  [static]

Adds http://.

Adds http:// to the $url. If https:// or http:// is present then the original $url is returned.

Parameters:
string $url The url.
Returns:
string The formatted url.

Definition at line 82 of file Helper.php.

Referenced by Boo_Format::formatUri(), and Boo_Format::formatUrl().

static Boo_Helper::addHttps ( $  url  )  [static]

Adds https://.

Adds https:// to the $url. If http:// is present, it is replaced with https://.

Parameters:
string $url The url.
Returns:
string The formatted url.

static Boo_Helper::getFileExtension ( $  filename  )  [static]

Returns file extension.

Updated to use PHP function pathinfo() instead. If the file is a backup file (ends in a tilde) then a tilde is returned regardles of extension.

Parameters:
string $filename The filename.
Returns:
string The file extension. If no file extension is included NULL returned, FALSE on error.

static Boo_Helper::getUuid (  )  [static]

Generates a Universally Unique IDentifier, version 4.

See also:
http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4122.txt
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UUID
Returns:
string A UUID, made up of 32 hex digits and 4 hyphens.

Definition at line 250 of file Helper.php.

static Boo_Helper::removeCurrencySymbol ( $  price  )  [static]

Removes the currency symbol.

You must correctly set BOO_CURRENCY_SYMBOL in your config file for this function to work.

Parameters:
string $price The price.
Returns:
string The formated price.
